DBRaportLatex

Class DBRaportLatex

    Main class of DBRaportLatex Package. Main program using all other classes to achieve program goals.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBRaportLatex

        public DBRaportLatex()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. Start of the program. Main can be divided into stages. If any of stage fails program should be terminated. 1. Load configuration file 2. Using loaded configuration variables to establish database connection 3. Load templates of latex documents 4. Parse SQL queries From templates 5. Execute those queries and fill in templates with records from it. 6. Save all filled templates in new files. 7. Compile chosen files with latex compiler. After all 7 stages we can enjoy our generated documents or raports.
        Parameters:
        args - the command line arguments
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - something went wrong
        java.sql.SQLException - something went wrong
